comments.content:
Don't think it's a font as it, more a custom job/logo. You could do the same with any wide/extended sans of your choice.  
Sans to customize with a straight-legged /R: [Trade Gothic Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016012903/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/trade+gothic), [Akzidenz Grotesk Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016012903/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/akzidenz+grotesk)  
Sans with similar /R: [Code](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016012903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/code-pro/), [Archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016012903/http:/fontfabric.com/archive-free-font/)
I was afraid that would be the case - I'll definitely try your suggestion. Thanks!
